long_description: The Garmin VIRB wrist strap mounts your VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera to your wrist so you can easily capture your adventure. Extra long strap can be used on your thigh or ankle, a tree, pole, animal collar-virtually anywhere you can imagine. Interlocking joints provide durable, anti-vibration locking performance by gripping in place instead of relying solely on tension.
short_description: The Garmin VIRB wrist strap mounts your VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera to your wrist so you can easily capture your adventure.
